snippet.title: White Heaven - Canceled Game Trailer, Preserved (READ DESCRIPTION)
snippet.description:
! I DO NOT OWN THIS TRAILER. THIS IS A REUPLOAD OF A TRAILER THAT WAS TAKEN DOWN YEARS AGO FOR ARCHIVAL PURPOSES. !

I managed to find this on a "gaming news" website that freebooted it and allowed anyone to download the video source. That was a few years ago, so I'm not certain if that page is still operational. I'm posting this here so I can include it on the IGDB page I'm creating for this game, purely for archival purposes. Since IGDB doesn't allow you to post links to any website that isn't YouTube, this will have to do for the time being.

This trailer is the property of Dreampaints Software, who can be found here: https://www.dreampainterssoft.com/
